author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Galliford Try Says 1 for 3 Rights Issue of 27.7 Mln Shares at 568p closed for acceptances
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Galliford Try PLC:
* RESULTS OF RIGHTS ISSUE * ANNOUNCES THAT 1 FOR 3 RIGHTS ISSUE OF 27.7 MILLION SHARES AT 568 PENCE PER SHARE CLOSED FOR ACCEPTANCES AT 11:00 A.M. ON 13 APRIL 2018
* RECEIVED VALID ACCEPTANCES IN RESPECT OF 25.4 MILLION SHARES, ABOUT 91.50 PERCENT OF SHARES TO BE ISSUED IN FULLY UNDERWRITTEN RIGHTS ISSUE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
